ingredients.ingredient: 3 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves, halved
1 (.6 ounce) packet zesty Italian salad dressing mix

cookingTips: Cut potatoes uniformly so they cook at the same rate as chicken
Toss all ingredients with melted butter and seasoning before cooking
Cover pan while cooking to trap steam and cook chicken through
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Show the cook how to build a balanced one-pan meal with protein and vegetables that finish cooking simultaneously.
